pages.title: Reagent Effects
pages.text: Most <thing>reagents/$ (but not all) have an <thing>effect/$ when released into the world. Unlike <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/beams)beam effects/$ which get more powerful as power/quantity increases, all <thing>reagent effects/$ will stay the same strength at all quantities. Instead, as quantity increases, the distance the <thing>effect/$ spreads increases.$(br2)
Easy ways to release <thing>reagents/$ are by $(l:essentials:alchemy/glassware)pouring out a Phial, throwing a Shell/$, or $(l:essentials:alchemy/vent)piping out a Chemical Vent/$.$(br2)

Different <thing>$(l:essentials:intro/alchemy)phases/$ of matter will make the <thing>effects/$ spread differently.$(br2)<thing>Solids/$ will apply only at the position they were released. If there is <em>any/$ <thing>liquid/$ being released, all <thing>solid reagents/$ will have their effects apply everywhere the <thing>liquids/$ spray- allowing even 1 unit of <thing>solid/$ reagent to apply over a large area if mixed with <thing>liquid/$, like

<thing>liquid/$ water.$(br2)<thing>Liquids/$ will splash out over a small area- the splash radius is <thing>total liquid qty/$ / 8, capped at 3 blocks. All <thing>liquids/$ will splash together, and will apply their <thing>effects/$ along with the <thing>effects/$ of any <thing>solids/$ in the mix.$(br2)<thing>Gasses/$ will spread out over a medium area- the splash radius

is <thing>total gas qty/$ / 3, capped at 8 blocks. All <thing>gasses/$ will spread together, applying their <thing>effects/$ over the entire volume. However, <thing>gasses/$ <em>will not apply/$ any <thing>liquid/$ or <thing>solid/$ <thing>effects/$ over the affected volume.$(br2)<thing>Flame/$ is a special <thing>phase/$ which only applies to two reagents- <item>Phelostogen/$ and <item>Ignis Infernum/$- both of which are always <thing>flame phase/$

regardless of temperature. When a <thing>flame reagent/$ is released, it will spread over an extremely large area: Radius is <thing>phelostogen qty/$ / 2 (cap 8 blocks) or <thing>ignis infernum qty/$ * 4 (cap <em>64/$ blocks). This means the range caps out at 16 units of <thing>flame/$ reagent. Any and all <thing>reagents/$ will have their <thing>effects/$ applied over the entire area. Pure <thing>flame reagents/$ will destroy any blocks they touch-

<em>unless there is any <item>alchemical salt/$<em> in the mix/$. That means any <thing>effect/$ can be spread out over a massive area using 16 of a <thing>flame reagent/$, 1 unit of <item>alchemical salt/$ to prevent destroying blocks, and the <thing>reagents/$ you want applied. As flame clouds are extremely destructive, it is recommended to keep some <item>$(l:essentials:alchemy/damping)damping powder/$ on hand for accidents.$(br2)

The following useful effects exist:$(br2)<item>Aqua Regia, Acids:/$ See the $(l:essentials:alchemy/acid)acids page/$. Allows getting <item>bedrock dust/$.$(br2)<item>Salt and Alchemical Salt:/$ Kill plants, creepers, and slimes like a <item>$(l:essentials:fluid/ingr)Salt Block/$ does.$(br2)<item>Chlorine:/$ Apply a massive number of crippling debuffs to any

entities. Wither, slowness, weakness, blindness, and others- the quintessential chemical weapon.$(br2)<item>Sulfur Dioxide:/$ Cures Zombie Villagers. Also cures poison and hunger.$(br2)<item>Phelostogen and Ignis Infernum:/$ Destroys all blocks and sets fires, unless there is any (even 1) <item>alchemical salt/$ in the mix being

released. Locked to <thing>flame phase/$, spreading <thing>effects/$ over a massive area (see above).$(br2)<item>Aether, Lumen, Eldrine, Fusas, and Stasisol:/$ See the $(l:essentials:alchemy/terraforming)Terraforming entry/$.$(br2)<item>Voltus:/$ Electrocutes any nearby entities with lightning arcs (10 damage per hit, may hit several times). Can charge creepers/pigs/etc. Combine
with a <thing>flame phase/$ for an expanding cloud of electric death.$(br2)
